memberdef.argsstring: (const char *name, int id, vector< vector< double >> &demands_all_realizations, int number_of_week_demands, const double percent_contingency_fund_contribution, const vector< vector< double >> &typesMonthlyDemandFraction, const vector< vector< double >> &typesMonthlyWaterPrice, WwtpDischargeRule wwtp_discharge_rule, double demand_buffer)
memberdef.name: Utility

detaileddescription.para:
Main constructor for the Utility class.
name
Utility name (e.g. Raleigh_water)
id
Numeric ID assigned to that utility.
demands_all_realizations
Text file containing utility's demand series.
number_of_week_demands
Length of weeks in demand series.
typesMonthlyDemandFraction
Table of size 12 (months in year) by number of consumer tiers with the fraction of the total demand consumed by each tier in each month of the year. The last column must be the fraction of the demand treated as sewage. The summation of all number in a row but the last one, therefore, must sum to 1.
typesMonthlyWaterPrice
Monthly water price for each tier. The last column is the price charged for waste water treatment.
wwtp_discharge_rule
53 weeks long time series according to which fractions of sewage is discharged in different water sources (normally one for each WWTP).

memberdef.argsstring: (int week, vector< vector< double >> &demands, bool apply_demand_buffer=false)
memberdef.name: splitDemands

detaileddescription.para:
Splits demands among sources. Demand is allocated so that river intakes and reuse are first used to their capacity before requesting water from allocations in reservoirs.
week

memberdef.argsstring: (double unrestricted_demand, double demand_multiplier, double demand_offset, double unfulfilled_demand, int week)
memberdef.name: updateContingencyFundAndDebtService

detaileddescription.para:
Update contingency fund based on regular contribution, restrictions, and transfers. This function works for both sources and receivers of transfers, and the transfer water prices are different than regular prices for both sources and receivers. It also stores the cost of drought mitigation.
unrestricted_demand
demand_multiplier
demand_offset
contingency fund contribution or draw.

Calculates total debt payments to be made in a week, if that's the first week of the year.
week

r
